title: Add Task Schedule Request
description: Request a task to be executed at a fixed schedule

schedule.description: Schedule for the task, format following the cron string standard

unix_millis_start_at.description: (Optional) Timestamp in unix epoch milliseconds, at which the schedule should start, will be set to now if undefined

unix_millis_finish_at.description: (Optional) Timestamp in unix epoch milliseconds, at which the schedule should end. Will be ending at int64 wrap time if undefined.
